sentences.sContent: Within minutes the whole house was ablaze.
sentences.sCn: 几分钟内，整座房子就成了一片火海。

sentences.sContent: The factory had been set ablaze (=  made to burn  ) .

remMethod.val: a + blaze(火焰) → 火焰般的 → 燃烧的

trans.tranCn: 着火的， 燃烧的； 闪耀的； 情绪激动的
trans.tranOther: burning strongly with a lot of flames
